titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nunn. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/14/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Armed Services, from March 1, 1987, through February 29, 1988, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize department or agency personnel on a reimbursable basis; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide training for its professional staff.
